parameters.query: ={{ `SELECT n.article, n.name, n.category, p.price, p.in_stock, o.name as city, p.updated_at FROM liberti_nomenclature n JOIN liberti_prices p ON p.nomenclature_id = n.id JOIN outlets o ON o.id = p.outlet_id WHERE n.article = '${$json.article.replace(/'/g, "''")}' ORDER BY p.updated_at DESC;` }}
